title: The Spiral Uprising
outcome: Inspired by rumors of Halden's original spiral design, neighborhood assemblies adopt a new 'spiral permit' system that undermines the BCI. Directorate backlash is met with collective resistance as citizens experiment with open movement and resource sharing, slowly dissolving Council authority and forcing a reimagining of the city's future based on cooperation rather than control.

events.description: Citizen groups launch 'spiral permits,' granting access across districts regardless of official BCI status; participation spreads rapidly.
The Directorate attempts to disable the spiral system, but coordinated neighborhood resistance blocks their efforts.
Resource sharing and open transit increase, leading to higher cooperation and a partial breakdown of BCI-driven restrictions.
Oksana finds old system blueprints showing Halden's spiral model and releases them as inspiration for further experimentation.
Council authority collapses as assemblies across the city formalize spiral-inspired governance, marking the end of centralized BCI control.
